about_the_game:
In Gnomemade you will are tasked with managing a small bakery. Using whatever you have at your disposal to bake and customize a variety of pastries, delighting your gnome customers by crafting a wide range of pastries, from traditional dishes to more.. unique creations, and watch as your bakery and it's culinary abominations... I mean creations becomes the talk of the town.

Creative Combinations
Unleash your culinary creativity with a wealth of combinations, from delicious strawberry pies to more unique dishes such as trout loaves with habanero sauce. Your decisions shape the product, satisfying diverse palates and defining your bakery's reputation among the gnomes.

A Helping Hand
Meet your staff, a cast of interesting characters tasked with helping you run your bakery. Bake a loaf with the cook, chunk some lemons with the Chunker, create some sauce with the Saucer and bring it all together into a one delicious package with the plater... or throw it all in the cauldron and start again.

A Touch Of Magic
Gnomemade features 4 unique potions for you to use to give you the upper hand at satisfying your customers:
  • Hypnotise: Will cause any customer to accept any product no matter their requirements.
  • Midas: Will cause any customer to give you more gold for an item
  • Mimic: Duplicates any product, customer, topping or ingredient.
  • Chaos: Randomises any card

Features:
  • Crafting System: Mix and match ingredients to create an endless variety of baked goods, from delightful strawberry cookies to daring trout loaves with cashew sauce.
  • 3 Different product types: Pie, Cookie & Loaf
  • 30 Ingredients, 60 Toppings for over 50k combinations
  • 4 Potions
  • Gnomes!

Gnomemade will soon be releasing in early access, come join the journey where your feedback helps shape the future of the game from new features, new items, new ingredients and more on our way to 1.0!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 compatible with at least 500MB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Gnomemade is a card-based baking game where you manage a gnome-run bakery, satisfy your fellow gnomes' specific tastes by creating all kinds of traditional, weird, wacky and even mystical creations!
